subject: Part of order shipping from China
description_text:
Hello, I recently placed order SSN3356.

My pedals are being delivered today however I noticed that the haptics set
is shipping separately from China. This was not disclosed at any point
during the sale and I want to make sure I will not be responsible for
tariffs or additional fees upon it's arrival. I purchased through you
directly to avoid any situations like this.

Thanks,

conversations.body_text: Hi Alex Lasher,    Don't worry, there won't be any customs issues. We expect to deliver it to you within the next couple of days.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047039806723
